articles.title: CD Projekt Faces Another Class-Action Lawsuit Over Cyberpunk 2077 - GameSpot

articles.content: Cyberpunk 2077 is one of the biggest games of the past few months, but the controversy surrounding the game continues to grow even a month after launch. Now, developer CD Projekt has acknowledged tha… [+1391 chars]
